src.AndroidTempo

Class ConnectionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • src.AndroidTempo.ConnectionService

  • public class ConnectionService
extends Service
    This class is used to manage Bluetooth connections and collect data.
    Author:
    Mohammed Nauage

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConnectionService.LocalBinder
      Default binder description for this service

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static File rootDir
      Directory in which all the data concerning this Application will be held.
      static byte SESSION_STARTED_PROPERLY
      Signifies a session was properly started
      static String SPP_UUID
      Serial Port Profile Universal Unique Identifier
      static File tempDir
      Directory where all the temporary files for the session will exist.
      static byte UNABLE_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_ALL_DEVICES
      Signifies in the processes of starting a session there existed devices with which the application was unable to communicate
      static byte UNABLE_TO_CONNECT_TO_ALL_DEVICES
      Signifies in the processes of starting a session there existed devices to which a connection could not be established
      static byte UNABLE_TO_DISCOVER_ALL_DEVICES
      Signifies in the processes of starting a session there existed devices which could not be discovered

    • Method Detail

      • getLock

        public boolean getLock()

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)
        Returns the communication channel to the service.
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent that was used to bind to this service, as given to Context.bindService.
        Returns:
        Return an IBinder through which clients can call on to the service.

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                 int flags,
                 int startId)
        Prepares the service.
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent supplied to startService(Intent), as given.
        flags - Additional data about this start request. Currently either 0, START_FLAG_REDELIVERY, or START_FLAG_RETRY.
        startId - A unique integer representing this specific request to start.
        Returns:
        The return value indicates what semantics the system should use for the service's current started state.

      • setHandler

        public void setHandler(Handler handler)
        Setter for a mHandler. mHandler allows messages to be passed among the service and other threads which have access to the handler
        Parameters:
        handler - a message passing interface

      • startPipeData

        public PipedInputStream startPipeData(String mac)

      • stopPipeData

        public void stopPipeData(String mac)

      • startSession

        public byte startSession(String[] macs)
        Sets up and starts the sessions with the device to which the given MACs addresses belong.
        Parameters:
        macs - MAC addresses of the devices from which you want to collect data
        Returns:
        Bitwise OR of a combination SESSION_STARTED_PROPERLY, UNABLE_TO_DISCOVER_ALL_DEVICES, UNABLE_TO_CONNECT_TO_ALL_DEVICES, and UNABLE_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_ALL_DEVICES depending which events occured.

      • stopSession

        public boolean stopSession()
        Ends the session by disconnecting all nodes and clears all fields
        Returns:
        True it successfully disconnected from all nodes and cleared all fields else false

      • allNodesCollecting

        public boolean allNodesCollecting()
        Checks the collection state of all nodes
        Returns:
        True if collecting from all nodes else false
